text: Crystal Sky Pictures is an independent American film production company that develops its own films for production, acquiring the rights to popular video games, comic books, graphic novels, toys, and other brands and supplying the funding for rights, script development, and production. Crystal Sky is owned by film producer Steven Paul. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="1" width="33" | Year ! rowspan="1" | Title ! rowspan="1" | Notes |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 1992 | align="left"| The Double 0 Kid | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 1999 | align="left"| Baby Geniuses | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2004 | align="left"| Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2 | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2005 | align="left"| Solo | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="3"| 2007 | align="left"| Ghost Rider | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="left"| Bratz | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="left"| Big Stan | align="left"| Direct-to-video |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2008 | align="left"| Doomsday | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2009 | align="left"| Opposite Day | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="2"| 2009 | align="left"| Tekken | align="left"| Direct-to-video in North America |-align="center" | align="left"| Robosapien: Rebooted | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2011 | align="left"| Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2014 | align="left"| Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge | align="left"| Limited theatrical release in Asia |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2016 | align="left"| JL Ranch | align="left"| |-align="center" | align="center" rowspan="1"| 2017 | align="left"| Ghost in the Shell | align="left"| Uncredited |} ==External links== * Official site Category:Film production companies of the United States
